string.text: Children Grow Faster Redux loaded succesfully.
{randomChild.Name} has gained the trait {randomTrait.Name} with level {randomTraitLevel}!
Children Grow Faster Redux
Children Growth Rate Settings
Growth Boost By Days
Adjusts how many days to add to normal growth day. If you set it to 1 it means children will get older twice as fast. Normal day + 1 day = 2 days older in one day. [Default: 1]
When Hero Comes of Age?

Let this mod know when children will come of age. Why? Because if you use 'Bannerlord Expanded - Children Expanded' mod, there is a setting 'Hero Comes of Age', make this setting same as that one. [Default: 18]
Affect Player Children Only
Mod only affects growth rate of player children. [Default: false]
Instant Children Growth
Children will grow to adulthood instantly. [Default: false]
Affect Everyone
Growth rate affects all children and all adults. [Default: false]
Random Traits
Random Traits For Player Children
Enables random traits for player children. [Default: false]
Trait Chance
Chance of children gaining a random trait (in percent). [Default: 5]
Days Between Next Trait Can Be Added
How many days must pass since the last trait was added before attempting to add the next trait? Keep in mind that for the next trait to be added, the 'Trait Chance' value must be met. [Default: 10]
Pregnancy Duration (Harmony Patch)
Enable Adjustable Pregnancy Duration

Must be enabled for the below slider to work. This feature will enable Harmony Postfix patch so please check with your other mods that adjusts pregnancy duration before enabling it. Maybe some other mod already does the same thing. [Default: false]
Adjust Pregnancy Duration
Adjust the number of days it takes for children to be born. [Default: 36]
